text.p: -- EVEREN Securities said Wednesday it raised it estimate for 1998 earnings for PacifiCorp to $1.75 a share from $1.70. The 1997 estimate of $1.65 was maintained.

-- EVEREN said PacifiCorp reported better-than-expected 1996 earnings, and raised 1998 as a result of planned acquisitions in 1997 and to reflect a modest increase in earnings from the company's Australian electric investments.
-- Nonetheless, EVEREN said it does not foresee a dividend increase in 1997, and investment performance may be improved by swapping out of PacifiCorp and into another stock in the industry.
-- Shares of PacifiCorp were off 1/4 at 20-3/8.
